overview:
Joe Buczkowski is founder and CEO of LeaseRunner.com.

Joe is responsible for the strategic business direction of the company, as well as the design and the functionality of LeaseRunner.com.

He is accountable for legal drafting and compliance with federal and state internet business laws, merchant banking and NACHA regulations, Fair Credit Reporting Act and other privacy laws, residential and commercial real estate statutes, and employment regulations.

Joe plans and secures the financial needs of the company, and focuses upon financial resilience and investor relations. He evaluates business opportunities, prepares accounting reports,hires employees and vendors, and guides marketing and social media strategy.

degrees.subject: Law, Real Estate, Finance
degrees.institution: University of Colorado School of Law
